com.muquit.libsodiumjna

Class SodiumUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.muquit.libsodiumjna.SodiumUtils

  • public class SodiumUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class to convert hex to binary and vice versa. It uses apache commons Hex class. I get confused (dyslexic) with encode decode methods of org.apache.commons.codec.binary.Hex class and always have to look it up!

      SodiumUtils()

      static java.lang.String binary2Hex(byte[] data)
      Convert binary data to Hex string.
      static byte[] hex2Binary(java.lang.String hexString)
      Convert a Hex string to Binary.

    • Method Detail

      • hex2Binary

        public static byte[] hex2Binary(java.lang.String hexString)
        Convert a Hex string to Binary. It uses org.apache.commons.codec.binary.Hex.decodeHex(char[])
        Parameters:
        hexString - Hex string to convert
        Returns:
        Binary bytes

      • binary2Hex

        public static java.lang.String binary2Hex(byte[] data)
        Convert binary data to Hex string. It uses org.apache.commons.codec.binary.Hex.encodeHexString(byte[])
        Parameters:
        data - Binary data bytes to convert
        Returns:
        Hex string
